inject-button.Name: Display Easy Notes button?
inject-button.Hint: Controls whether or not Easy Notes can be opened from the player list.

textarea-height.Name: Text area height
textarea-height.Hint: Increase or reduce the rows of Easy Notes text area. (default is 40)

textarea-width.Name: Text area width
textarea-width.Hint: Increase or reduce the columns of Easy Notes text area. (default is 80; will refresh the page on save)

bg-color.Name: Background color
bg-color.Hint: Change the background color of Easy Notes text area. (default is trasparent)

text-color.Name: Text color
text-color.Hint: Change the text color in Easy Notes text area. (default is black)

text-size.Name: Text size
text-size.Hint: Change the text size in Easy Notes text area. (default is 100; also changes the size of text area)

text-weight.Name: Text weight
text-weight.Hint: Change the text weight in Easy Notes text area. (default is 400)
